i2d::IMultiCalibrationProvider Class Reference

Common interface for an object, which delivers a list of 2D-calibration objects. More...

Detailed Description

Common interface for an object, which delivers a list of 2D-calibration objects.

virtual const i2d::ITransformation2d* i2d::IMultiCalibrationProvider::GetCalibration ( int  calibrationIndex) const [pure virtual]

Get access to transformation object with a given index, which transforms a local logical coordinate system to global one.

Returns:
Pointer to transformation if it is accessible, or NULL.

virtual const iprm::ISelectionConstraints* i2d::IMultiCalibrationProvider::GetCalibrationSelectionContraints ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get optional information about calibration objects in form of section contraints.

It allows to get name and description of each calibration object.
